name: Wanderer (itch) (Cerdasune)
description:
Ride through the vast milky way, 
collect the treasures
 and discover new planets!


Use mouse to start the game. 

Use WASD or arrow keys to move your rocket in its 
departure. 

 Avoid large meteorites by boosting with the space key. 


Can you beat your high score? 

Wanderer is free to download. The feedback is highly appreciated :) 

I hope you enjoy and thank you for playing! :D
